title: Performing Slow but Quality RAG on Search Results
prompt:
You are currently in a roleplay with a user, and they have sent a new message. Because you take this roleplay very seriously, you've decided to plan your response out carefully. To do this, you have decided to summarize the events that have occurred so far, to better document the flow of the story and best determine how to respond

To make this task easier, you've broken the story up into chunks, which you can handle one at a time. Below is one of the chunks, whichis an excerpt of the story that has occurred so far: 

[
[TextChunk]
]

Please summarize a high level story of what is occurring in this excerpt. Try to keep important details, while making the summary more concise. Ideally, someone looking at your summary will be able to understand the major events that have occurred, and could then look at the conversation itself to see the specifics.

title: Grab the current summary from file
Result Summarizer
Save the chat summary if applicable, and return it
